example.name: non-referential it with no exp trace
example.text: It behooves us to get to get at the root of the problem.
example.arg: us to get to get at the root of the problem.

example.name: it + exp
example.text: it [exp-1] ill behooves me [s-1] to criticize Safire's arch puns.

example.name: The rare sentence not begining with 'it'
example.text: To reflect on this matter would behoove us.
